Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur's photo.
message:
Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur brings you IBM technology challenge!

This challenge is divided into 3 phases :-
Online Quiz Challenge - There are 30 MCQs to be solved in 60 minutes.
Hack Camp - Hack Camp will be set-up, where mentors from IBM will impart knowledge on IBM technologies and train students for the next stage.
Hackathon - This is the final stage where students will be developing applications based on IBM technologies.

Register now at www.venturesity.com/ibm
Hack Camp Venue : 27th August | Vikramshila | 10 AM

story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Cultural, IIT Kharagpur's photo.
message:
Poetry submission for FRESHERS. 
You can submit only one poem in either Hindi or English. 
The word limit is 100-200 words. Submit your poem at tsg.socult@gmail.com. 
Mention your name and roll number in the email with the file attached.
The deadline for submission is 23rd august(Tuesday) midnight, after that no submission will be accepted.
 For any doubts contact Dhruv Mahajan - 8890166175

Nimb is a ring with a panic button that allows you to send an emergency alert to preset contacts from the mobile app with just the touch of a thumb.
